pages.text: Use to bind yourself to the $(d)Stable Ender Pearl$().$(br2)After seven seconds of existing as an item entity, the Pearl will $(3)teleport the bound player to its location$().
pages.title: Stable Ender Pearl

pages.text: You don't have to drop it yourself! It'll still teleport you if it's dropped in any other way.$(br2)It has to be loaded though, and you must be in the same dimension!
